text: hin*A<AZL>k@ yApA<MEH>h ra`@yAtiy<PAS> hin*A<MUN>k@ yApA<ZQP>h `eyna<MUN>yik@ ywoni<ZQP>ym mib*a<TIP>`ad l@Yam*Ate<ATN>k@ W/ׂa`@rek@<PAS> k*@`e<MUN>dEr hA<SIL>`iz*i<ZQP>ym W/.Eg*A<SIL>l@W/.<TIP>w* meha<MER>r g*il@`A<SIL>d:
W/.in*a<AZL>yik@<PAS> k*@`e<MUN>dEr haq*@Yw*b<ZQP>wot W/.E<SIL>`Al<TIP>w* min=hA<SIL>rax@YA<ATN>h W/.Ek*ul*Am<PAS> mat@'iym<ZQP>wot w@W/.ak*ulA<TIP>h 'e<MER>yn b*AhE<SIL>m:
k*@x<MEH>w*T haW/*.Aniy<PAS> W/ׂip@twota<ZQP>yik@ w*mid@b*Are<TIP>k@ nA'wE<ATN>h k*@pE<MEH>lax hA<SIL>rim*won<PAS> raq*Ate<ZQP>k@ mib*a<TIP>`ad l@Yam*Ate<SIL>k@:
k*@mig@d*a<MEH>l d*Awiyd<PAS> Yaw*A're<ZQP>k@ b*An<TIP>w*y l@tal@p*iy*<ATN>wot 'E<MEH>lEp ham*Agen<PAS> t*Al<MUN>w*y `AlA<ZQP>yw k*o<TIP>l W/.il@Te<MER>y hag*ib*ori<SIL>ym:
W/.@ne<MER>y W/.Ada<TEB>yik@ k*iW/.@ne<MER>y `<HQA>pAri<TIP>ym t*@'wome<MUN>y Y@biy*A<ATN>h hA<SIL>rwo`i<TIP>ym b*aW/*.<SIL>woW/.an*i<SIL>ym:
`a<MEH>d W/.Ey*Ap<AZL>w*xa<PAS> hay*<ZQP>wom w@nA<TIP>sw* haY*@lAli<ATN>ym 'e<MEH>lEk@ liy<PAS> 'El=ha<MUN>r ham*<ZQP>wor w@'El=g*ib@`a<TIP>t hal*@bwonA<SIL>h:
k*ul*A<MEH>k@ yApAh<PAS> ra`@yAti<ZQP>y w*m<TIP>w*m 'e<MER>yn b*A<SIL>k@:

'it*i<MEH>y mil*@bAnwon<PAS> k*al*A<ZQP>h 'it*i<TIP>y mil*@bAn<MUN>won t*Ab<ATN>wo'iy t*AW/.<MUN>w*riy | mero<MUN>'W/. '<HPA>mAnA<RBM>h mero<MEH>'W/. W/ׂ@niyr<PAS> w@xEr@m<ZQP>won mim*@`on<MUN>wot '<HPA>rAy<ZQP>wot me<SIL>har@re<TIP>y n@meri<SIL>ym:
lib*ab@t*i<TIP>niy '<HPA>xoti<MUN>y kal*A<ATN>h lib*ab@t*i<AZL>niy<PAS> b'xd (b*@'axa<MUN>t) me<SIL>`eyna<ZQP>yik@ b*@'axa<MER>d `<HPA>nA<TIP>q miY*aw*@ronA<SIL>yik@:
mah=y*Ap<MER>w* doda<TIP>yik@ '<HPA>xoti<MUN>y kal*A<ATN>h mah=T*o<MEH>bw* doda<AZL>yik@<PAS> miy*a<ZQP>yin w@re<MER>yxa W/.@mAna<TIP>yik@ mik*Al=b*@W/ׂAmi<SIL>ym:
no<TEB>pEt t*iT*o<MER>p@nAh W/ׂip@twota<TIP>yik@ k*al*A<ATN>h d*@ba<MEH>W/. w@xAlAb<PAS> t*a<MUN>xat l@W/.wone<ZQP>k@ w@re<MER>yxa W/ׂal@mota<TIP>yik@ k*@re<MER>yxa l@bAn<SIL>won:
g*a<MER>n | nA`<TIP>w*l '<HPA>xoti<MUN>y kal*A<ATN>h g*a<MER>l nA`<TIP>w*l ma`@yA<MER>n xAt<SIL>w*m:
W/.@lAxa<AZL>yik@<PAS> p*ar@d*e<MUN>s rim*woni<ZQP>ym `i<TIP>m p*@ri<MUN>y m@gAdi<ATN>ym k*@pAri<TIP>ym `im=n@rAdi<SIL>ym:
ne<MUN>r@d*@ | w@kar@k*o<RBM>m qAnEh<PAS> w@qin*Am<ZQP>won `i<TIP>m k*Al=`<HPA>Ye<MUN>y l@bwonA<ATN>h mo<YET>r wa<SIL>'<HPA>hAl<ZQP>wot `i<TIP>m k*Al=rA'W/.e<MER>y b@W/ׂAmi<SIL>ym:
ma`@ya<MUN>n g*an*i<ZQP>ym b*@'e<TIP>r ma<MUN>yim xay*i<ATN>ym w@no<SIL>z@li<TIP>ym min=l@bAn<SIL>won:
`<MEH>w*riy YApwon<PAS> w*b<MUN>wo'iy teymA<ZQP>n hApi<MER>yxiy gan*i<TIP>y yiz*@l<MUN>w* b@W/ׂAmA<ATN>yw yAbo<MEH>' dwodiy<PAS> l@gan*<ZQP>wo w@yo'ka<TIP>l p*@ri<MER>y m@gAdA<SIL>yw:

b*A<MUN>'tiy l@gan*iy<ZIN> '<HPA>xoti<MUN>y kal*Ah<AST> 'Ari<MEH>ytiy mworiy<PAS> `im=b*@W/ׂAmi<ZQP>y 'Aka<MEH>l@t*iy ya`@riy<PAS> `im=d*ib@W/.i<ZQP>y W/.Ati<MER>ytiy yeyni<TIP>y `im=x<HPA>lAbi<ATN>y 'ik@l<MUN>w* re`i<ZQP>ym W/.@t<MER>w* w@W/.ik@r<TIP>w* d*wodi<SIL>ym:

'<HPA>ni<MER>y y@W/.enA<TIP>h w@lib*i<MUN>y `e<ATN>r q<MUN>wol | d*wodi<MUN>y dwope<RBM>q p*it@xiy=li<GAR>y '<HPA>xoti<MEH>y ra`@yAtiy<PAS> y<SIL>wonAti<MUN>y tam*Ati<ZQP>y W/.Er*o'W/.iy<PAS> nim@lA'=TA<ZQP>l q@wuY*wota<TIP>y r@si<MER>ysey lA<SIL>y@lAh:
p*AW/.a<AZL>T@t*iy<PAS> 'Et=k*ut*An@t*i<ZQP>y 'eykA<TIP>kAh 'El@b*AW/.E<ATN>n*Ah rAxa<MER>Y@t*iy 'Et=rag@la<TIP>y 'eykA<MER>kAh '<HPA>Tan*@pe<SIL>m:
d*wodi<RBM>y W/.Ala<MEH>x yAdwo<PAS> min=haxo<ZQP>r w*me`a<TIP>y hAm<MER>w* `AlA<SIL>yw:
qa<MER>m@t*i<SIL>y '<HPA>ni<TIP>y lip@t*o<MUN>xa l@dwodi<ATN>y w@yAda<MUN>y nA<SIL>T@pw*=m<RBM>wor w@'EY@b*@`otay<PAS> m<MUN>wor `obe<ZQP>r `a<TIP>l k*ap*<MER>wot ham*an@`<SIL>w*l:

p*Ata<MEH>x@t*i<SIL>y '<HPA>niy<PAS> l@dwodi<ZQP>y w@dwodi<TIP>y xAma<MUN>q `AbA<ATN>r nap@W/.iy<PAS> yA<SIL>Y@'A<MUN>h b@dab*@r<ZQP>wo b*iq*aW/.@t*i<AZL>yhw*<PAS> w@lo<MUN>' m@YA'ti<ZQP>yhw* q@rA'ti<TIP>yw w@lo<MER>' `AnA<SIL>niy:

m@YA'u<DAR>niy haW/*.o<SIL>m@ri<TEB>ym has*o<SIL>b@bi<MER>ym b*A`i<TIP>yr hik*<MUN>w*niy p@YA`<ATN>w*niy nA<SIL>W/ׂ@'<MEH>w* 'Et=r@diydiy<PAS> me<SIL>`Ala<ZQP>y W/.o<SIL>m@re<TIP>y ha<SIL>xom<SIL>wot:
hiW/.@b*a<MER>`@t*iy 'Et@kE<TIP>m b*@n<MUN>wot y@r<SIL>w*W/.AlA<ATN>im 'i<SIL>m=t*im@Y@'w*<PAS> 'Et=d*wodi<ZQP>y mah=t*ag*i<MUN>ydw* l<ZQP>wo W/.E<SIL>xwola<MER>t 'a<SIL>h<HPA>bA<TIP>h 'A<SIL>niy:
mah=d*wode<MUN>k@ mid*<ZQP>wod hay*ApA<TIP>h b*an*AW/.i<ATN>ym mah=d*wode<MUN>k@ mid*<ZQP>wod W/.Ek*A<TIP>kAh hiW/.@b*a`@t*A<SIL>nw*:
d*wodi<MER>y Yax<PAS> w@'Ad<ZQP>wom d*Ag<TIP>w*l me<SIL>r@bAbA<SIL>h:
ro'W/.<TIP>wo k*E<MUN>tEm p*A<ATN>z q@wuY*wotAyw<PAS> t*al@t*al*i<ZQP>ym W/.@xor<TIP>wot k*A<SIL>`wore<SIL>b:
`eynA<ZQM>yw k*@ywoni<TIP>ym `al='<HPA>pi<MUN>yqey mA<ATN>yim ro<SIL>x<HPA>Ywot<PAS> b*E<SIL>xAlA<ZQP>b yo<SIL>W/.@b<TIP>wot `al=mil*e<SIL>'t:
l@xAyAw<PAS> k*a<SIL>`<HPA>rw*ga<MUN>t hab*o<ZQP>W/ׂEm mig@d*@l<TIP>wot mEr@qAxi<ATN>ym W/ׂip@twotAyw<PAS> W/.<SIL>woW/.an*i<ZQP>ym no<SIL>T@p<TIP>wot m<MER>wor `obe<SIL>r:
yAdAyw<PAS> g*@liyle<MUN>y zAhA<ZQP>b m@mul*A'i<TIP>ym b*at*ar@W/.i<ATN>yW/. me`Ayw<PAS> `E<MUN>W/.Et W/.e<ZQP>n m@`ul*E<TIP>pEt sap*iyri<SIL>ym:
W/.woqAyw<PAS> `am*<MUN>w*dey W/.e<ZQP>W/. m@yus*Adi<TIP>ym `al='ad@ney=pA<ATN>z mar@'e<AZL>hw*<PAS> k*al*@bAn<ZQP>won b*Ax<TIP>w*r k*A<SIL>'<HPA>rAzi<SIL>ym:
xik*wo<PAS> ma<SIL>m@taq*i<ZQP>ym w@kul*<TIP>wo ma<SIL>x<HPA>mad*i<ATN>ym zE<MEH>h dwodiy<PAS> w@zE<MUN>h re`i<ZQP>y b*@n<TIP>wot y@r<SIL>w*W/.AlA<SIL>im:

W/.<MEH>w*biy W/.<AZL>w*biy<PAS> haW/*.<MUN>w*lam*i<ZQP>yt W/.<MER>w*biy W/.<TIP>w*biy w@nE<SIL>x<HSE>zEh=b*A<ATN>k@ ma<SIL>h=t*Ex<HSE>zw*<PAS> b*aW/*.<MUN>w*lam*i<ZQP>yt k*im@xola<TIP>t ha<SIL>m*ax<HPA>nA<SIL>yim:
mah=y*Ap<DAR>w* p@`Ama<TEB>yik@ b*an*@`Ali<TIP>ym b*at=nAdi<ATN>yb xam*w*qe<MUN>y y@reka<ZQP>yik@ k*@m<MUN>wo x<HPA>lA'i<ZQP>ym ma<SIL>`<HPA>W/ׂe<TIP>h y@de<MER>y 'Am*A<SIL>n:
W/.Ar@rek@<PAS> 'ag*a<MUN>n has*a<ZQP>har 'al=yEx@sa<TIP>r ham*A<ATN>zEg b*iT@nek@<PAS> `<HPA>rema<MUN>t xiT*i<ZQP>ym sw*gA<TIP>h b*aW/*.<SIL>woW/.an*i<SIL>ym:
W/.@ne<MER>y W/.Ada<TEB>yik@ k*iW/.@ne<MER>y `<HQA>pAri<TIP>ym t*A<SIL>'<HQA>me<MER>y Y@biy*A<SIL>h:

Yaw*A're<TIP>k@ k*@mig@d*a<MUN>l haW/*.e<ATN>n `eyna<GER>yik@ b*@rek<MUN>wot b*@xEW/.@b*<RBM>won `al=W/.a<AZL>`ar<PAS> b*at=rab*i<ZQP>ym 'ap*ek@<PAS> k*@mig@d*a<MUN>l hal*@bAn<ZQP>won YwopE<TIP>h p*@ne<MER>y dam*A<SIL>W/ׂEq:
ro'W/.e<MEH>k@ `Ala<AZL>yik@<PAS> k*ak*ar@mE<ZQP>l w@dal*a<MER>t ro'W/.e<TIP>k@ k*A<SIL>'ar@g*AmA<ATN>n mE<TIP>lEk@ 'As<MER>w*r b*A<SIL>r@hATi<SIL>ym:
mah=y*Apiyt<PAS> w*mah=n*A`a<ZQP>m@t*@ 'a<SIL>h<HPA>bA<TIP>h b*at*a<SIL>`<HPA>nw*gi<SIL>ym:
zo<MEH>'t q<SIL>womAtek@<PAS> d*A<SIL>m@tA<MUN>h l@tAmA<ZQP>r w@W/.Ada<TIP>yik@ l@'aW/.@k*ol<SIL>wot:

'Ama<AZL>r@t*iy<PAS> 'E<SIL>`<HSE>lE<MUN>h b@tAmA<ZQP>r 'o<SIL>x<HPA>zA<TIP>h b*@san@sin*A<ATN>yw w@yi<SIL>h@yw*=nA<MEH>' W/.Ada<AZL>yik@<PAS> k*@'EW/.@k*@l<MUN>wot hag*E<ZQP>pEn w@re<MER>yxa 'ap*e<TIP>k@ k*at*ap*w*xi<SIL>ym:
w@xik*e<ZQM>k@ k*@ye<MER>yn haT*<TEB>wob hwole<MER>k@ l@dwodi<TIP>y l@me<SIL>yW/.Ari<ATN>ym d*wobe<TIP>b W/ׂip@te<MER>y y@W/.eni<SIL>ym:
'<HPA>ni<MUN>y l@dwodi<ZQP>y w@`Ala<TIP>y t*@W/.<SIL>w*qAt<SIL>wo:
l@kA<MEH>h dwodiy<PAS> neYe<MUN>' haW/*ׂAdE<ZQP>h nAli<TIP>ynAh b*ak*@pAri<SIL>ym:

naW/.@k*i<AZL>ymAh<PAS> lak*@rAmi<ZQP>ym nir@'E<GAR>h 'im=p*A<SIL>r@xA<MEH>h hag*E<AZL>pEn<PAS> p*it*a<MUN>x has*@mAda<ZQP>r hene<TIP>Yw* hA<SIL>rim*woni<ATN>ym W/.A<TEB>m 'Et*e<MER>n 'Et=d*oda<TIP>y lA<SIL>k@:
ha<SIL>d*w*dA'i<MUN>ym nA<SIL>t@nw*=re<RBM>yxa w@`al=p*@tAxe<AZL>ynw*<PAS> k*Al=m@gAdi<ZQP>ym x<HPA>dAW/.i<TIP>ym g*am=y@W/.Ani<ATN>ym d*wodi<TIP>y YApa<MER>n@t*iy lA<SIL>k@:
'A<YET>nAh hAla<MUN>k@ d*wode<ZQP>k@ hay*ApA<TIP>h b*an*AW/.i<ATN>ym 'A<YET>nAh p*AnA<MUN>h dwode<ZQP>k@ w*n@baq@W/.E<TIP>n*w* `im*A<SIL>k@:
d*wodiy<PAS> yAra<MUN>d l@gan*<ZQP>wo la<SIL>`<HPA>rug<TIP>wot hab*o<ATN>W/ׂEm lir@`wot<PAS> b*ag*an*i<ZQP>ym w@lil@qo<TIP>T W/.<SIL>woW/.an*i<SIL>ym:
'<HPA>ni<MEH>y l@dwodiy<PAS> w@dwodi<MUN>y li<ZQP>y hA<SIL>ro`E<TIP>h b*aW/*.<SIL>woW/.an*i<SIL>ym:
yApA<AZL>h 'a<MEH>t*@ ra`@yAtiy<PAS> k*@tir@YA<ZQP>h nA'wA<TIP>h k*iyr<SIL>w*W/.AlA<ATN>im '<HPA>yum*A<TIP>h k*an*id@g*Al<SIL>wot:
hAse<MEH>b*iy `eyna<AZL>yik@<PAS> min*Eg@d*i<ZQP>y W/.E<MER>he<TIP>m hir@hiybu<ATN>niy W/ׂa`@rek@<PAS> k*@`e<MUN>dEr hA<SIL>`iz*i<ZQP>ym W/.Eg*A<SIL>l@W/.<TIP>w* min=hag*il@`A<SIL>d:
W/.in*a<AZL>yik@<PAS> k*@`e<MUN>dEr hA<SIL>r@xeli<ZQP>ym W/.E<SIL>`Al<TIP>w* min=hA<SIL>rax@YA<ATN>h W/.Ek*ul*Am<PAS> mat@'iym<ZQP>wot w@W/.ak*ulA<TIP>h 'e<MER>yn b*AhE<SIL>m:
k*@pE<MEH>lax hA<SIL>rim*won<PAS> raq*Ate<ZQP>k@ mib*a<TIP>`ad l@Yam*Ate<SIL>k@:
W/.iW/*.i<MER>ym he<AZL>m*Ah<PAS> m@lAk<ZQP>wot w*W/.@moni<TIP>ym p*i<SIL>ylag@W/.i<ATN>ym wa<SIL>`<HPA>lAm<TIP>wot 'e<MER>yn mis@p*A<SIL>r:

'axa<MER>t hiy'<PAS> y<SIL>wonAti<MUN>y tam*Ati<ZQP>y 'axa<MER>t hiy'<PAS> l@'im*A<ZQP>h* b*ArA<MER>h hi<TIP>y' l@y<SIL>wolad@t*A<ATN>h* rA'<MEH>w*hA bAnwot<PAS> wa<SIL>y@'aW/*.@r<ZQP>w*hA m@lAk<MER>wot w*pi<SIL>ylag@W/.i<TIP>ym wa<SIL>y@hal@l<SIL>w*hA:
miy=zo<MER>'t han*iW/.@qApA<TIP>h k*@mwo=W/.A<ATN>xar yApA<MUN>h kal*@bAnA<RBM>h b*ArAh<PAS> k*a<SIL>xam*A<ZQP>h '<HPA>yum*A<TIP>h k*an*id@g*Al<SIL>wot:
'El=g*in*a<MEH>t '<HSE>gwoz<PAS> yAra<ZQP>d@t*iy lir@'<TIP>wot b*@'ib*e<MUN>y han*A<ATN>xal lir@'wot<PAS> h<HPA>pA<SIL>r@xA<MUN>h hag*E<ZQP>pEn hene<TIP>Yw* hA<SIL>rim*oni<SIL>ym:
lo<MUN>' yAda<ZQP>`@t*iy nap@W/.i<MUN>y W/ׂAma<ZQP>t@niy mar@k*@b<TIP>wot `am*i<MER>y nAdi<SIL>yb:
'<HPA>niy<PAS> x<HPA>baY*E<MUN>lEt haW/*.Ar<ZQP>won W/.<SIL>woW/.an*a<TIP>t hA<SIL>`<HPA>mAqi<SIL>ym:
k*@W/.<SIL>woW/.an*Ah<PAS> b*e<MUN>yn ha<SIL>xwoxi<ZQP>ym k*e<MER>n ra`@yAti<TIP>y b*e<MER>yn hab*An<SIL>wot:

k*@tap*<AZL>w*xa<PAS> b*a<SIL>`<HPA>Ye<MUN>y hay*a<ZQP>`ar k*e<MER>n d*wodi<TIP>y b*e<MUN>yn hab*Ani<ATN>ym b*@Yil*wo<PAS> xim*a<MUN>d@t*iy w@yAW/.a<ZQP>b@t*iy w*pir@y<TIP>wo mAt<MER>woq l@xik*i<SIL>y:
h<HSE>biy'a<AZL>niy<PAS> 'El=b*e<MUN>yt hay*A<ZQP>yin w@dig@l<MER>wo `Ala<TIP>y 'a<SIL>h<HPA>bA<SIL>h:
sam*@k<AZL>w*niy<PAS> b*A<SIL>'<HPA>W/.iyW/.<ZQP>wot rap*@d<TIP>w*niy b*at*ap*w*xi<ATN>ym k*i<SIL>y=xwola<MER>t 'a<SIL>h<HPA>bA<TIP>h 'A<SIL>niy:
W/ׂ@mo'lwo<PAS> t*a<MUN>xat l@ro'W/.i<ZQP>y wi<SIL>ymiyn<TIP>wo t*@xab*@qe<SIL>niy:

hiW/.@b*a<AZL>`@t*iy 'Et@kE<GER>m b*@n<MEH>wot y@r<SIL>w*W/.Ala<AZL>im<PAS> b*iY@bA'<ZQP>wot '<TIP>wo b*@'ay@l<MUN>wot haW/*ׂAdE<ATN>h 'im=t*A`i<DAR>yrw* | w@<SIL>'im=t*@`<MER>wor@r<TEB>w* 'Et=hA'a<SIL>h<HPA>bA<TIP>h `a<MER>d W/.Et*Ex@p*A<SIL>Y:
q<MUN>wol d*wodi<ZQP>y hin*eh=zE<TIP>h b*A<ATN>' m@dal*eg<PAS> `al=hE<MUN>hAri<ZQP>ym m@qap*e<TIP>Y `al=hag*@bA`<SIL>wot:

d*womE<MEH>h dwodiy<PAS> liY@bi<ZQP>y '<TIP>wo l@`o<MUN>pEr hA<SIL>'ay*Ali<ATN>ym hin*eh=zE<MEH>h `womed<PAS> 'axa<MUN>r k*At@le<ZQP>nw* maW/.@g*i<AZL>yxa<PAS> min=ha<SIL>xal*on<ZQP>wot meYi<TIP>yY min=ha<SIL>x<HPA>rak*i<SIL>ym:
`AnA<MER>h dwodi<TIP>y w@'A<MUN>mar li<ATN>y q<MER>w*miy lA<TEB>k@ ra`@yAti<MER>y yA<SIL>pAti<TIP>y w*l@kiy=lA<SIL>k@:
k*i<SIL>y=hin*e<MER>h has*@tA<TIP>w `AbA<ATN>r hag*E<ZQM>W/.Em xAla<TIP>p hAla<MER>k@ l<SIL>wo:
han*iY*Aniym<PAS> nir@'<MUN>w* bA'A<ZQP>rEY `e<MER>t haz*Ami<TIP>yr hig*i<ATN>y`a w@q<MER>wol hat*<TIP>wor niW/.@ma<MER>` b*@'ar@Ye<SIL>nw*:
